item.title: Start with a toy
item.description: Stole this idea from Start with a toy — Gordon Brander Instead of starting with a “product”, start with what might be considered a toy: fun, simple, not particularly productive.

item.title: The 80/20 Rule
item.description: aka 80/20 rule Related: [[notes/Occam’s Razor]] -> do the most obvious, simplest things

item.title: Unsorted links
item.description: All you need is links - by Gordon Brander - Subconscious Decentralization enables permissionless innovation sort of antifragility concept but more practical, variety, range of motion, more freedom means less fragility, more adaptibility.
